name: "Home" A FNaF Fan-Game (DEMO)
description:
A Gameboy Graphics style FNaF fan game based on the Afton Family. 

Currently in the alpha stage!! Everything here may change, but for now, this is all I have :) hope you all like it!

*I AM IN NO WAY AFFILIATED WITH SCOTT CAWTHON OR STEEL WOOL STUDIOS*

*FOR THIS GAME YOU WILL NEED A GAMEBOY EMULATOR!! I PROVIDED A LINK BELOW, BUT ANY KIND SHOULD WORK!!*

INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO INSTALL & PLAY-

go through the folders "build > rom" then, locate game.gb. All of these are important, but this is the game.

Now, if you don't already have one installed, you will need a gameboy emulator.

(the emulator that I use - https://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gba/vboyadvance.html)

I know this is tedious, but it's fun because it makes it more authentic :)

So then once you have one installed, just drag the game.gb file from earlier into that program and you are ready to play! :D

Hope you have fun :)
